paragraphs: In a year saturated with sweatsuits, Hailey Bieber’s collection managed to stand out. The model has worn tie-dye sweats, a two-piece lilac set by Drew House (Justin Bieber’s line), and even a pair of sweatpants that were deliberately inside-out. But this week, she wore perhaps her most stylish take on loungewear yet—proving that, as we head into 2021, rocking a sweatsuit can still be a major look. All it takes is two key accessories.

On Instagram yesterday, the model rocked a classic, gray tracksuit. She finished the look with a padded green puffer vest from Bottega Veneta, and the mini green woven leather bag to match. The two pops of color immediately amped up the ensemble and turned it into a statement, albeit a casual one.

So, the next time you’re finding yourself gravitating towards your beloved sweats? Find your most colorful coat, vest, or bag—bonus points if they’re from an it-brand, like Bieber’s—and simply throw them overtop. It’s the easiest and quickest solution for tricking others into thinking you’ve put in effort.
